thread.title: On the Air

title: On the Air
text:
Published October 13. 2015 12:01AM 
Baseball 
4:30 p.m., TBS — NLDS: St. Louis Cardinals at Chicago Cubs in Game 4. 
8 p.m., TBS, WOR (710-AM) — NLDS: Los Angeles Dodgers at New York Mets in Game 4. 
Football 
8 p.m., ESPN2 — NCAA: Arkansas State at South Alabama. 
Hockey 
7:05 p.m., WFAN (660-AM) — NHL: Nashville Predators at New Jersey Devils. 
7:30 p.m., NBCSN — NHL: Tampa Bay Lightning at Detroit Red Wings. 
Soccer 
2:30 p.m., FS1 — UEFA European qualifying: Norway at Italy. 
2:30 p.m., ESPN2 — UEFA European qualifying: Czech Republic at Netherlands. 
6:55 p.m., ESPN — Men's exhibition: United States vs. Costa Rica from Harrison, N.J.
